From: Tech in Asia <no-reply@techinasia.com> To: a0097723@gmail.com Subject: Read our exclusive story about the growing pains at a Hong Kong unicorn Date: June 19, 2019 at 9:05:20 AM GMT+8
Dear readers,
After interviewing nine insiders, I wrote an exclusive about the challenges faced by smartphone rental startup Tink Labs (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=f88897fa45&e=5d18a397d7) as it expanded globally. It’s been a roller coaster ride for its 27-year-old CEO, who dropped out of college to put up this biz, and the hundreds of employees who work at the company.
If you want to know what it’s really like to work at a fast-growing, well-funded startup, this is an essential read.
Another one of our top articles last week was a profile of Fore Coffee, a coffee delivery startup that’s taking Indonesia by storm (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=9ffc3e33bb&e=5d18a397d7). Find out how it grew to serve 300,000 cups of coffee a month.
There’s a reason why you won’t find these stories anywhere else – they take time and effort to produce, and a subscription (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=d2f92908ab&e=5d18a397d7) is the best way to ensure such journalism get published.
Check out the rest of our recent premium content:
Big money
Vertex Ventures to launch $770m fund with Japanese partners (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=04e92569c8&e=5d18a397d7) Huawei: What you need to know (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=d32b80cd97&e=5d18a397d7) Meet the 100 top-funded fintech companies in China (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=6bfd8e9f41&e=5d18a397d7)
Up-and-comers Rising startups on Tech In Asia: replacing real estate brokers, salon-booking, and more (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=d2cdafc3cb&e=5d18a397d7) Why a South Korean home-cleaning startup is going into pet sitting (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=45e2762e05&e=5d18a397d7) Smart walkie-talkie startup by 2359 Media founder is profitable without funding (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=ac9b3060fa&e=5d18a397d7)
Stuff you may have missed Can Shopee become profitable? Here’s an in-depth analysis (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=c8d5523ccb&e=5d18a397d7) Honestbee: The inside story of what went wrong and what’s next (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=9599daab11&e=5d18a397d7) A closer look at Gojek’s huge growth numbers (https://techinasia.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=69b62eeb7c1cbee5f131e976e&id=67f33ae48e&e=5d18a397d7)
Cheers,

Be indispensable with data science skills. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
About Us (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.) Browse Courses (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.) Get Matched (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.)
Explore Uncharted Territory
There's a shortage of data scientists in Singapore. With the explosion of data collection, companies need analysts capable of turning raw numbers into powerful business predictions, but there simply aren’t enough qualified people to manage this deluge of information. Learn to harness machine learning and the data modeling skills you'll need to capitalize on this demand with our evening Data Science (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.43351/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5lcmFsYXNzZW1iLmx5L2VkdWNhdGlvbi9kYXRhLXNjaWVuY2U_) course.
What's the first step?
Request a syllabus (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.43351/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5lcmFsYXNzZW1iLmx5L2VkdWNhdGlvbi9kYXRhLXNjaWVuY2U_) to see if the course is right for you. Get answers to the most frequently asked questions (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.43351/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5lcmFsYXNzZW1iLmx5L2VkdWNhdGlvbi9kYXRhLXNjaWVuY2U_) about the course. Discover how one GA grad mixed music and math to launch a data science career (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.).
Request and View Syllabus (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.43351/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5lcmFsYXNzZW1iLmx5L2VkdWNhdGlvbi9kYXRhLXNjaWVuY2U_)
Ready to dive into data science? Submit your application (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.) today and our Admissions team will be in touch.
Prerequisites: To succeed in the course you will need experience with Python or an object-oriented programming language, familiarity with basic data manipulation, and a working knowledge of statistics. Prepare yourself by enrolling in our data science prep classes and workshops (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17238848.43351/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5lcmFsYXNzZW1iLmx5L2Jyb3dzZS9kYXRhLWNvdXJzZXMtYW5kLWNsYXNzZXM_).

From: 兩廳院電子報 <service@mail.npac-ntch.org> To: a0097723@gmail.com Subject: 用日常物件擊奏出柏拉圖的千年寓言 Date: June 20, 2019 at 6:44:27 PM GMT+8
如無法順利瀏覽電子報，請點我 (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_0)
2019 June 21th. no.875 電子報
</同>
2019/7/19~21
實驗劇場
用日常物件擊奏出柏拉圖的千年寓言
2019新點子實驗場 薛詠之《柏拉圖的洞穴》
柏拉圖的洞穴寓言說的是走出舒適圈的重要，演出中擊樂家敲打著非典型樂器並旋轉跳舞，舞者展現不熟悉的肢體動作並轉身打擊，兩人都在熟悉又陌生的領域中大膽衝撞，也拉著觀眾的感官，慢慢帶進洞穴中囚禁，再走向洞外釋放，是場融合聲響、舞蹈、戲劇的奇幻體驗。 ......more (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_2)
兩廳院 玉山文教基金會連續五年支持兩廳院圓夢計畫 (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_3)
熱門推薦 NTCH program /
2019/7/12～14
實驗劇場
演員終極考驗 實境實驗劇場
2019新點子實驗場 OD表演工作室《克隆少年》
實境實驗劇場，除了演出之外，還需要與觀眾討論對談，因此對演員最大的挑戰，除了建構角色之外，更多需要臨場反應，即時回答觀眾對主題的疑問。《克隆少年》中角色包含社會學家、文史學者、生物學家、教育工作者、心理學家等專家學者，演員除了消化大量的專業知識外，就看他們如何解決觀眾的疑惑。......more (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_5)
2019/7/14
國家音樂廳
歐美最潮的理髮廳重唱 再掀阿卡貝拉復古熱
《從理髮廳走出來的拉縴人》
獲20餘座國際獎項、4座金曲獎，臺灣最強男聲「拉縴人男聲合唱團」與首度來台的瑞典重唱冠軍天團Ringmasters合體，帶來歐美風行50年以上、源起於19世紀末期，非洲裔即興傳統音樂的「理髮廳合唱」，兼具舞台動感與無伴奏清唱的全新體驗，在阿卡貝拉當道之際，讓我們重回1930年代的理髮廳光景，與東方型男拉縴人、歐系熟男Ringmasters來一場復古時尚的阿卡約會！.......more (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_7)
2019/7/20
臺東縣政府文化處藝文中心演藝廳
2019臺東藝術節《巴哈之夜音樂會》
全本雙鋼琴協奏曲臺東首演
巴哈⼀共寫下三⾸雙鋼琴協奏曲，囿於場地與演奏編制等因素，雖然樂曲本⾝極為動聽但在國內甚少有機會完整演出，觀眾⼤多只有機會欣賞巴哈的單⼀鋼琴的協奏曲。此次為了讓臺東藝術節的活動內容更加豐富且有深度，製作團隊排除困難，特尋覓兩架音樂會⽤鋼琴並邀請國內優秀的弦樂家⼀同合作，為愛樂者拓寬⾳樂會欣賞曲⽬。...... more (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_9)
2019/7/20~21
臺北市政大樓親子劇場
《老鼠娶親之公主不想嫁？》
愛樂劇工廠兒童歌舞劇
人人都羨慕的貝蒂公主，在18歲成年禮的前夕，拒絕接受老鼠王國的傳統，只要在公主成年禮當天的"比武大會"，獲勝的勇士將可以娶回老鼠王國的第一公主貝蒂，並將接受加冕成為新任的老鼠國王。究竟太陽王子、烏雲大俠、北風公子、牆壁博士，誰才能贏得比賽，順利娶回公主？而住在老鼠王國孤兒院裡的青青和小凱，因緣際會下認識了美麗的貝蒂公主......more (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_11)
OpenArts藝文指南針 OA Compass /
OpenArts數位進行式，啟動你的文化新體驗 別懷疑，這本小書還是藝文指南針。從六月號起，重新設計的《藝文指南針》改版為兩廳院售票系統的實體刊物《OpenArts 藝文指南針》。編輯每期也將推出「阿特直送」單元，透過軟性有趣的步調與觀眾分享當月的表演焦點，提供戲迷、樂迷與各路粉絲們，當月的演出活動資訊。
兩廳院之友 NTCH Members Service /
人生必入手的一張卡—— 兩廳院之友
一張會員卡讓你與表演藝術零距離！
持兩廳院之友會員卡每年生日享有最高5折的節目折扣電子禮金，平時能優先購買兩廳院主辦節目，獨享預購8折優惠，還有全台最大的表演藝術圖書館全年免費入館借閱，讓你細緻地用藝文滋潤生活。......。more (http://crm.npac-ntch.org/web_service/P/a.aspx?m=ntch&c=epaper20190406&e=23&s=48536&md=0&t=A_15)

From: PlanGrid <support@plangrid.com> To: a0097723@gmail.com Subject: PlanGrid Launches Project Hub to bring your closer to the field Date: June 20, 2019 at 9:56:53 PM GMT+8
Hi Koh,
As your project data grows in PlanGrid, it can be a challenge to navigate, focus and keep track of the items that need your attention. Project Hub (http://em.plangrid.com/n0J10PT02G0j0VS03o00pF1) is your new home screen on Web, where you can see what’s happening on your project in one place.
With Project Hub, see your team's activity in real time, and quickly identify who needs to sync to the most current set. Stay focused with a personalized view of work assigned to you as well as any flagged items that are overdue or unassigned. Plan better with a quick view of your project timeline, local weather, and more.
Start using Project Hub (http://em.plangrid.com/n0J10PT02G0j0VS03o00pF1), now automatically available for all projects on PlanGrid.
LEARN MORE (http://em.plangrid.com/n0J10PT02G0j0VS03o00pF1)
You can also watch this video (http://em.plangrid.com/P00000pJjS01Q10F03UVoG2) to learn more about all of the Project Hub features.
Cheers!

From: AngelList Weekly <newsletters@angel.co> To: a0097723@gmail.com Subject: GitHub just got even better Date: June 21, 2019 at 2:38:24 AM GMT+8
Plus: Los Angeles is leaking tech talent
View Online (https://sg-mktg._NhUy7fT7U=)
One year ago this month, Microsoft announced its $7.5 billion acquisition of GitHub. This week, Microsoft announced another GitHub-related (https://u13051.ct.sendgrid.net/mpss/c/HwE/-zI/t.2sm/SGWwM3zdStylfWw58JGPHQ/h1/UyDry-2Fjbicl7zA1Jj8MzU11SoNLhrpKcdjdLhIJkot-2BrrV5EOeYrhLDiJKRZnVPAHDT4qfO63NX9cNwWkPE0fXqTMzhVMewZblEPqS2XfYi6O6Bp9MnbLvJrIxTDEMzn) acquisition: Pull Panda, a suite of GitHub tools that Microsoft plans to merge directly into GitHub.
Pull Panda, for those unfamiliar, provides the following GitHub tools: Pull Reminders: a Slack integration to update you about open pull requests Pull Analytics: an analytics tool for engineering managers to learn about their team Pull Assigner: an automated review assigner.
Microsoft’s acquisitions of GitHub and now Pull Panda highlight how valuable companies in the engineering tool space can be.
Software has been “eating the world” for decades now. Only 1% of (https://u13051.ct.sendgrid.net/mpss/c/HwE/-zI/t.2sm/SGWwM3zdStylfWw58JGPHQ/h2/pc8HsrSSu9up-2F7Wb0LLVBXy-2FzyuKhvfiXmlr2QS-2FRX-2BY6zx5gERxEhfNgrs0FKr3o-2FpdLDSh0fPbh4C8c0Ovrw-3D-3D) software engineers are unemployed, and more and more people are pouring into the practice, as companies continue to expand their teams. The rapid growth of the software industry is leading to bigger, more complicated organizations, and the need for tools to support engineering teams is growing in tandem. Surveying the landscape now, you can see a whole generation of companies offering new software, designed specifically to make managing engineers easier.
Intelligence tools, like Code Climate (https://u13051.ct.sendgrid.net/mpss/c/HwE/-zI/t.2sm/SGWwM3zdStylfWw58JGPHQ/h3/pc8HsrSSu9up-2F7Wb0LLVBSIv-2BJG21RmB6g1F95WDO8D-2FfRazOR94Bv866c9AumZz), help engineering managers analyze and optimize their teams on a new level. Review platforms, like Percy.io (https://u13051.ct.sendgrid.net/mpss/c/HwE/-zI/t.2sm/SGWwM3zdStylfWw58JGPHQ/h4/pc8HsrSSu9up-2F7Wb0LLVBaOWuo-2F5WvagtL6EuvN7l0E-3D), make code reviews easier—and more visual—than ever. Reporting tools, like Codecov (https://u13051.ct.sendgrid.net/mpss/c/HwE/-zI/t.2sm/SGWwM3zdStylfWw58JGPHQ/h5/pc8HsrSSu9up-2F7Wb0LLVBfd9koimRuo127jo7JbwOAU-3D), add a new layer of convenience and power to coverage reports.
The growth of these companies—and their acquisition by giants like Microsoft—signals that the market isn’t slowing. The software industry is going to keep growing, and that means more engineers will follow. More engineers mean bigger teams, and bigger teams need better tools.
As the old adage says: In a gold rush, sell shovels.
Los Angeles is leaking tech talent
LA’s tech scene has a lot going for it—beautiful sunshine, booming amounts of venture capital, a lower cost of living than its Silicon Valley counterpart. But as it catches up with New York and the Bay Area to become one of the most sought-after destinations for engineers and technical talent, it’s also losing its most valuable asset—new grads.
Junior technical talent is leaving the area in droves, and while some find their way back after building experience elsewhere, many never do. That leaves LA startups searching for experienced talent and stuck with only two options: Warm up to the idea of distributed and colocated teams Devote additional time and resources toward convincing talent to relocate to LA
The first is already in full swing—LA is the most remote-friendly city on AngelList, with more than 30% of its job postings open to remote workers. But the second is still a very real challenge that founders, recruiters, and companies of all sizes face.
What if they didn’t have to?

Grow Smart With Data
Let numbers be your guide at work. The key to expanding any product and revenue is having a deep understanding of data. From software developers to CEOs, all stakeholders in a company are taking their cues from the stories that data can tell.
In our one-week or 10-week Data Analytics (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17262128.) course, you’ll learn Excel, SQL, and Tableau — essential tools for analyzing data to make better decisions at work.

APIs: Let's Break Them Down
Think about your experiences using ride-sharing apps, like Lyft. You’re able to request a car to your exact geographic coordinates, right down to the street corner. Without application programming interfaces (APIs) (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17262588.) to make this possible? You might be stuck with a long walk to the subway.
From the Dark Sky app that checks your zip code to give you the weather, to Instagram having access to your phone's camera, APIs are essential for allowing different softwares to communicate with one another. They're also a fundamental skill in web development. Read on for a guide to APIs from one of our expert instructors.
Read On (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17262588.)
Thinking of leveling up in coding? Check out the syllabus for our upcoming Software Engineering Immersive (https://link.generalassemb.ly/click/17262588.60352/aHR0cHM6Ly9nZW5lcmFsYXNzZW1iLmx5L2VkdWNhdGlvbi9zb2Z0d2FyZS1lbmdpbmVlcmluZy1pbW1lcnNpdmU_) career accelerator to see how you can transform your career with full-stack skills.

✔ FREE CANCELLATION: Book more than 7 days in advance for Free Cancellation.
Blog post of the week (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc310&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Where to stay in Bangkok: a neighbourhood guide (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc312&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Is there any city that speaks more to our backpacking hearts than Thailand’s epic capital? Experiencing its unique sights, smells and sounds is a backpacker’s rite of passage—make sure you don’t miss a trick with our trusty guide to the best areas to stay in around Bangkok.
READ BLOG POST (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc313&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
*Here's the competition T&Cs (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc315&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674) and Privacy Notice (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc316&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Hostel of the week (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc317&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Le Regent Montmartre By Hiphophostels (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc319&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
8.2 (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc31a&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Located in the famed Montmarte district, Le Regent Montmartre is right in front of the Sacré-Cœur, surrounded by restaurants and shops. Within a short walk you'll find the famous Moulin Rouge and Pigalle. Here you can enjoy free Wi-Fi and relax in their charming living room—it's perfect for meeting your fellow travellers. This homey hostel also has great laundry facilities and a large kitchen. The friendly staff are around 24/7 and have tons of tips on the best local hotspots.
Paris, France (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc31b&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
FROM €39 ▸ (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc31c&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Destination of the week (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc31d&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
Tokyo, Japan (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc31f&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)
We can pretty much guarantee you've never been anywhere like Tokyo. This atmospheric metropolis has inspired countless films and novels with its blend of neon skyscrapers, ancient serene temples and unique culture. Whether you're there for the cherry blossoms, the shopping or the the history, you won't be quite the same after experiencing this city. Even where you sleep is a unique experience—we've got ultra-modern boutique hostels, traditional ryokans and capsule hostels, too!
Find Tokyo hostels (http://t.emails.hostelworld.com/r/?id=h1e530a92,3aab9019,3aabc320&cid=PDM2043887&bid=508758674)

Its your last chance to register for our live digital conference, To the Cloud, Your Way, on June 26.
